    • System Commands
      • )off Close All
      • )fns List Functions
      • )vars List Variables
      • )lib List Libraries
      • )si Print Error Stack
      • )clear Clear Workspace
      • )wsid Rename workspace
      • )save Save workspace
      • )load Load Workspace
      • )fload Load script
      • )fcopy Copy script
